entities.name: montague
entities.description: Montague is mentioned as someone who tried to do something during break but was forced into a Vanishing Cabinet by Fred and George.

relationships.description: Snape has a worst memory related to Gryffindor, as indicated by the context of the hourglass and stones flying upward.
Fred forced Montague headfirst into a Vanishing Cabinet on the first floor.
George also forced Montague headfirst into a Vanishing Cabinet on the first floor.
Fred and George caused trouble by forcing Montague into the Vanishing Cabinet.
Fred and George caused trouble by forcing Montague into the Vanishing Cabinet.
Ron will get into trouble if he continues to participate in Fred and George's actions.
Hermione will also get into trouble if she participates in Fred and George's actions.
Fred and George are partners in crime, as indicated by their joint actions of forcing Montague into the Vanishing Cabinet.
